io.textile.textile

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.textile.textile.Files

  • public class Files
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to Textile files related APIs

      • addData

        public void addData(java.lang.String base64,
                    java.lang.String threadId,
                    java.lang.String caption,
                    Handlers.BlockHandler handler)
        Add raw data to to a Textile thread
        Parameters:
        base64 - Raw data as a base64 string
        threadId - The thread id the data will be added to
        caption - A caption for the input
        handler - An object that will get called with the resulting block

      • addFiles

        public void addFiles(java.lang.String files,
                     java.lang.String threadId,
                     java.lang.String caption,
                     Handlers.BlockHandler handler)
        Add file(s) to to a Textile thread
        Parameters:
        files - A comma-separated list of file paths
        threadId - The thread id the data will be added to
        caption - A caption for the input
        handler - An object that will get called with the resulting block

      • shareFiles

                       java.lang.String threadId,
                       java.lang.String caption,
                       Handlers.BlockHandler handler)
        Share files to a Textile thread
        Parameters:
        hash - The hash of the files graph to share
        threadId - The thread id the data will be added to
        caption - A caption for the shared input
        handler - An object that will get called with the resulting block

        public io.textile.pb.View.FilesList list(java.lang.String threadId,
                                         java.lang.String offset,
                                         long limit)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a list of files data from a thread
        Parameters:
        threadId - The thread to query
        offset - The offset to beging querying from
        limit - The max number of results to return
        Returns:
        An object containing a list of files data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The exception that occurred

        Get raw data for a file hash
        Parameters:

      • imageContentForMinWidth

        public void imageContentForMinWidth(java.lang.String path,
                                    long minWidth,
                                    Handlers.DataHandler handler)
        Helper function to return the most appropriate image data for a minimun image width
        Parameters:
        path - The IPFS path that includes image data for various image sizes
        minWidth - The width of the image the data will be used for
        handler - An object that will get called with the resulting data and media type
